alert.note: Alert for Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 15 at 6:29AM EST until November 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 AM EST FOR LOWER KEYS IN MONROE COUNTY... At 628 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Big Pine Key, or near Niles Channel Bridge, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Middle Torch Key, Little Torch Key, Big Pine Key, Ramrod Key, and Big Torch Key around 635 AM EST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include No Name Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 27 and 35. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
